workshoptitle: Migrate MySQL to Oracle Autonomous Database using Oracle SQL Developer

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction about this workshop and objectives.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Prereq 1 - Create Autonomous Database (ADB) as Target (Optional)
tutorials.description: This lab will help you create Oracle ADB (ADW/ATP) instance for target purpose, if you don't already have that

tutorials.title: Prereq 2 - Create Windows VM to run Oracle SQL Developer (Optional)
tutorials.description: This lab will help you create OCI Windows instance to later install SQL Developer. If you plan to run SQL Developer from your laptop or any desktop, you can skip this lab

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setup and Run Migration in SQL Developer
tutorials.description: All tasks to complete this migration

tutorials.title: Appendix: How to Connect to Autonomous Database from SQL Developer
tutorials.description: How to Make Connection to Autonomous Database from SQL Developer with Wallet

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
